mdq:check.name: Entity Identifier Present
mdq:check.description: Check that each entity has an identifier.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status global entityIdentifier
import metadig.variable as mvar
maxPrint = 3
# An entity identifier is not present if 'entityIdentifier' not in globals() or entityIdentifier is None: output = "An entity identifier was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
entityIdentifier = mvar.toUnicode(entityIdentifier) # If a single value, convert to a list for easier processing (i.e. don't have # to keep checking if it's a single value or list) if(isinstance(entityIdentifier, unicode)): entityIdentifier = [entityIdentifier]
# check if the identifier is blank # TODO: check the identifier namespace if (mvar.isBlank(entityIdentifier)): output = "The entity identifier is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: if(len(entityIdentifier) > 1): output = u"These {} entity identifiers were found: {}".format(len(entityIdentifier), entityIdentifier[0:maxPrint]) if(len(entityIdentifier) > maxPrint): output += u", ..." else: output = u"The entity identifier '{}' was found".format(entityIdentifier[0])
status = "SUCCESS" return True
